Your egg is born, and as tradition entails, once the egg is born the father of the baby will be used as meat for its future nourshiment, and to give it strength. Of course, has mother of the clan, you have the right to decide the fate of your consorts, but going against tradition might bring criticism and chalenges for your leadership role. What will you do with [father_of_egg.getDynName]?
As Harpy Witchmother, i will keep him alive!
He shall be exiled and i shall claim he was slain!
